Package com.nerjal.json

This package provides the ability to instantiate and manipulate JSON structures within Java.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApiTests  
    JsonError
    All exception classes used by the generic JsonLight API
    (doesn't include Mapper exceptions)
    JsonParser
    Default class for parsing JSON both way.
    All comments contained in the root of a JSON string being parsed to a JsonElement will be put in the main element of the JSON string.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JsonError.ChildNotFoundException
    Thrown when trying to get a child JsonElement from a JsonObject which doesn't have any for the given key.
    JsonError.FileNotFoundException
    Thrown when trying to parse an invalid file to a JsonElement
    JsonError.IllegalLineElementsNumberException
    Thrown when setting a JsonArray to stringify with an invalid number of elements per line (negative or null)
    JsonError.JsonElementTypeException
    Thrown when trying to get a typed element from a JsonElement which isn't of the corresponding type.
    JsonError.JsonParseException
    Thrown when trying to parse an invalid String to a JsonElement
    JsonError.RecursiveJsonElementException
    Thrown when trying to stringify a JsonElement containing itself.

Package com.nerjal.json Description

This package provides the ability to instantiate and manipulate JSON structures within Java. Parsing back and forth with strings is also fully supported using the JsonParser class's methods.
Version:
1.1.3
Author:
nerjal
See Also:
official repo
